title: Gr8 b8 rito, gr8 b8..
body:
I play league every day, usually 4-5 games a day, i've dc'd from one game this year last month.

I had to leave another today due to real world concerns, and i don't do it unless i absolutely have to.

I'm now in a low priority queue with a 20 minute wait time, your system is a joke riot. hands down pathetic. 

51 days so far this year, 4-5 games a day, 204-255 games so far, left 2 games, one unintentionally, and i know for a fact i didn't leave a game in December.

trolled by the best huh riot? tysm.
